text: 3:11 Onger Akaba 34:19; Aposel 13:14-52; 14:1-20; 2 Korin 1:10Nɨ arazir kurar gumazamiziba na gamiziba, nɨ dagh fo, egha uaghan mɨzazir kɨ Antiok ko Aikoniam ko Listran ikia iniziba sara. Ezɨ nɨ fo, me nguibar ekiar kabar arazir bar kurabar na gami. Ezɨ Ekiam osɨmtɨzir kabar aven nan akurazɨma kɨ deravɨra iti.
